title: A Man on a Train: Episode 219
description:
It was May 2006 and nineteen year old Tom Grant was heading home to Gloucestershire, after a successful first year at St Andrews University.

He could never have believed that a minor incident at the platform in Carlisle, as he changed trains, could lead to such shocking consequences.

Sponsored by YARN.
